modName: Tribal Might Armor HD -Glass Armor Rehaul-
summary: A High Definition full retexture of the glass armor. Vanilla Replacer or Standalone version.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img] http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/5001/tribalmightamor2.jpg [/img] [/center]

[center][u]Featured on Skyrim Mods Weekly[/u][/center]

[center][youtube]bLG-hUdLoCI[/youtube][/center]

_________________________________________________________________________________________

[b][color=#be2626][u]DESCRIPTON[/u][/color][/b]


A full new retexture of the glass armor. It includes:

-All textures made from scratch in 4x vanilla size (2x optional).
-High-quality normal, specular and environmental maps.
-All meshes edited, fixed, revised and made so they match texture colors, included khajits and argonians.
-Helmet has been heavily changed, removed glass parts, fixed alien-looking shape.
-Gauntlets and boots glass parts removed too.
-Fixed several clipping problems and bugs in the male cuirass, and added alpha transparencies.
-Fixed several clipping problems on the lower part of the back  in the female cuirass and other minor tweaks to fit my textures.
-All pieces are 100 % weight slider compatible.

_________________________________________________________________________________________


[b][color=#be2626][u]VERSION HISTORY[/u][/color][/b]

[u]4/03/2012[/u]

Armored Horse added. To download it go to http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12082


[u]25/02/2012[/u]

Version 1.2

-Shield added to all 4 versions (standalone, replacer and both reduced resolution).
-Male cuirass weight slider issues fixed.
-(Standalone only) Issues regarding armor not being compatible with light armor perks fixed. Now every light armor perk affect the armor normally.
-(Standalone only) Now located under \"glass armor\" in the forge menu. It now requires glass smithing to craft.
-(Standalone only) Materials needed to craft updated. You may find the new list at the \"Installation and Crafting\" tab in the mod description.


[u]24/02/2012[/u]

Version 1.1.5

-Matching shield released as a replacer for the glass shield.
-Reduced resolution version (2x vanilla) released for both standalone and replacer. Found under \"Optional Files\".


[u]22/02/2012[/u]

Version 1.1 Hotfix

-Hair clipping through helmet fixed.
-CTDS when equipping the male cuirass on a mannequin fixed.

Those who already downloaded standalone version 1.1 will have to download it again and replace files.


[u]21/02/2012[/u]

Version 1.1

-Added male and female standalone, craftable at forge.
-Added male and female vanilla replacer.


[u]19/02/2012[/u]

Version 1.0 

-Added male armor [vanilla replacer]

_________________________________________________________________________________________

[b][color=#be2626][u]TO DO LIST[/u][/color][/b]


-Weapons.
-Color variations as requested.

_________________________________________________________________________________________

[b][color=#be2626][u]INSTALLATION AND CRAFTING[/u][/color][/b]

[u]Standalone Version[/u]

Craftable at forge and fully upgradeable. You will find it under glass smithing. Same stats as dragonscale armor. It requires glass smithing perk and:

Cuirass: 3 Iron Ingots / 2 Steel Ingots / 2 Ebony Ingots / 2 Moonstone Ingots.
Helmet: 2 Iron Ingots / 2 Steel Ingots / 1 Ebony Ingot / 1 Moonstone Ingot.
Gauntlets: 2 Iron Ingots / 1 Steel Ingot / 1 Ebony Ingot / 1 Moonstone Ingot.
Boots: 2 Iron Ingots / 1 Steel Ingot / 1 Ebony Ingot / 1 Moonstone Ingot.
Shield: 3 Iron Ingots / 2 Steel Ingots / 1 Ebony Ingot / 1 Moonstone Ingot.

Fully upgradeable at the forge, requiring some of the above materials in different quantities.

(Alternatively you may type \"help Might 4\" at the console, copy the codes found there and then use \"player.additem *code* 1\".)

Copy the data folder to your Skyrim directory. Activate TribalMightArmor.esp in your data files.

To uninstall delete all the files located at: 

-Skyrim/data/TribalMightArmor.esp
-Skyrim/data/textures/armor/TribalMight
-Skyrim/data/meshes/armor/TribalMight


[u]Replacer Version[/u]

It will replace every glass armor on the game

Copy the data folder to your Skyrim directory.

To uninstall delete all the files located at: 

-Skyrim/data/textures/armor/glass
-Skyrim/data/meshes/armor/glass

_________________________________________________________________________________________

[b][color=#be2626][u]SPECIAL THANKS & CREDITS[/u][/color][/b]

-My girlfriend for all her support and patience, whose help has shown invaluable for finishing this armor. ;)

_________________________________________________________________________________________
author: Hairon
